alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 28 at 7:32AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...NORTHWESTERN HOWARD COUNTY IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...HARFORD COUNTY IN NORTHERN MARYLAND...NORTHEASTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND... At 728 AM EST, a snow shower was located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Taneytown to near Sykesville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Pikesville, Cockeysville, Westminster, Aberdeen, Havre De Grace, Towson, Bel Air South, Randallstown, Owings Mills, Bel Air North, Eldersburg, Reisterstown, Mays Chapel, Timonium, Mount Airy, Fallston, Taneytown, Hampstead, Hampton and Manchester. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area, including along Interstates 83 and 795 in Baltimore County Rapid changes in visibility to around a mile or less and potentially slick roads are likely.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
